title: Interpretation of a gift of a gold ring in a dream for a married woman according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a gift of a gold ring in a dream to a married woman: Gold jewelry is one of the things that a woman wants to acquire and adorn because of its attractive appearance and high value. Interpretation of a gift of a gold ring in a dream to a married woman in Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of gift of a gold ring in a dream to a married woman? If the husband gives his wife a ring in a dream Golden, the experts confirm the idea that this woman will soon give birth to a son, God willing. The previous vision shows the happiness of this woman, which is the blessing of the things she has, in addition to the arrival of good things to her home and family. But if the father gives her a gift, the dream indicates that the father is pleased with his behavior. This daughter, and is completely satisfied with her, and he may gain useful and useful things from her father. If someone presents it to her, translation scholars believe that the dream is a good sign that she will obtain a higher position at work, which will increase her salary and bring her prosperity. A women’s watch with a ring can be considered Gold is a sign of marital happiness, the absence of any tension between the two partners, and good, calm conditions and joy in their relationship. Interpretation of a gift of a gold ring in a dream for a married woman in Ibn Sirini. Ibn Sirin expresses this dream, saying that it is a lot of good for the woman, and the days may bring her an inheritance that will cause her joy and stability. Financially for her and her family. It tells us that the vision means that the married woman will get something expensive and important that she planned and prayed for, and she will reap beautiful and happy things from it, and God knows best. If she finds that the ruler of the country is giving her a ring, it is expected that she will achieve many successes in her coming days and raise her status greatly among Other matters. But if someone gave her this ring but it was stolen or lost, it is possible that the lady will fall into the trap of some obstacles and be forced to accept some circumstances that do not satisfy her. If she wears it and finds that her appearance is amazing and beautiful, Ibn Sirin says that there are happy events that she will face soon and change Her difficult financial circumstances. Masry website is the largest website specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just type the Egyptian dream interpretation site in Google and get the correct interpretations. The most important interpretations of seeing a golden ring in a dream for a married woman. Wearing a golden ring in a dream for a married woman. Al-Nabulsi confirms that wearing a gold ring has many connotations, most of which are good, as wearing it in general is a good message that explains goodness to her. The grace and stability that I will witness in her life soon, indicates something else related to this dream, which is that she will buy something new that will make her heart happy, whether it is a house, golden things, or something else, and if she wears this ring and finds it tight, it suggests getting rid of distress. that surrounds it. After losing a ring to a married woman, there may be disagreements between her and someone close to her, such as a husband or mother, and this relationship may become more complicated until the separation is complete, and if her relationship is tense and unpleasant with She can divorce her husband and start a new life, and this vision is b

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a dead Ibn Sirin?  Interpretation of a dream about dying of starvation according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a dead Ibn SirinInterpretation of a dream about a dead Ibn Sirin In a dream, what are the connotations of seeing a person kissing the dead in a dream? What are Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of seeing dead people in a dream? Is everything interpreted by the dead as good and living or not? In the following paragraphs you will find many secrets about the symbol of the dead in a dream by Ibn Sirin, read it now. Do you have a confused dream? what are you waiting for; Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream of the dead. If the dead appear in a dream, they convey many messages to the dreamer, and the message addressed to the dreamer varies according to the details of the vision as follows: Seeing peace for the dead in a dream: It indicates protection, survival, and a long life for the Lord. Seeing in a dream that you are eating dates Fresh with the deceased: It indicates the good work that the dreamer is doing in his life and the abundance of livelihood and legitimate money. You dream that you are going with the deceased on an unknown or dead-end road: It indicates that the dreamer will die soon. Seeing the dead beating the dreamer in a dream: It indicates an inheritance. A big one that the dreamer is about to receive soon, but if the beating is painful, then the vision shows scandalous and wrong actions carried out by the dreamer that caused many of his sins and the anger of the deceased towards him. Seeing dead people advises the dreamer in a dream: It indicates the need to enjoy this advice and apply it as it actually is. Seeing a dead person crying in a dream: It is interpreted by the joy and blessing that the dreamer enjoys in his life, and it is also interpreted by the poor condition of the deceased in his grave, but when the deceased appears crying profusely, the interpretation shows a lot of torment and pain. And sorrows. Which the dreamer will experience soon. Seeing the dead happy and smiling in a dream: It indicates the joys and happiness that come to the dreamer such as success, promotions, happy marriage, protection, and health. Seeing the undoing of many chains and chains that were tied to the body of the deceased in a dream: It interprets that the fortuneteller was able to Taking responsibility for the dead person, paying off all his debts, standing by his side, carrying out his will, and all of these good deeds make the dead person live in his grave without feeling distress and torment. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person for a single person, according to Ibn Sirin. An unmarried woman when she dreams of a dead man with an ugly face running after her, this scene A dream, not a vision, and it is considered one of the satanic dreams that the dreamer sees until he feels extreme fear and comfort is diminished. If the deceased gives the dreamer new clothes in the dream, the scene heralds abundant livelihood, marriage, and a happy life. Seeing the deceased mother being happy and giving the fiancé the fortuneteller gold jewelry in a dream The vision indicates that the dreamer will get married as soon as possible. If the dreamer wants to drink water and the dead woman gives her Zamzam water to drink from in the dream, then the scene indicates that she has become the wife of a person with good morals and good intentions and that she is pure and religious. And God gives her a lot of sustenance because she deserves it. Interpretation of a dream about a dead married woman by Ibn Sirin When a married woman sees the deceased feeding her delicious food in a dream

title: Interpretation of heavy rain in a dream by Ibn Sirin Walking in heavy rain in a dream and interpretation of heavy rain in a dream

preview.html: Heavy rain in a dream Seeing heavy rain in a dream is a promising vision. Who among us is not happy to watch it when it descends, for it is a blessing from the Lord of the Worlds, and its absence makes life difficult and dry, so we find that seeing it indicates good and happy meanings, and there is no... I doubt that there are some negatives that we will learn about through the opinion of our honorable scholars such as Ibn Sirin. Heavy rain in a dream. What is the interpretation of heavy rain in a dream? The vision expresses cleansing from sins and keeping away from all sins and the blessing and goodness that the dreamer sees in his life. His vision is good evidence for the dreamer. And it is an expression of the blessings that he experiences in his life. Not only this, but he cares about helping family and friends without exception. The fact that the rain caused the revival of the planting in the dream indicates the great comfort and tremendous blessings that the dreamer will see in his life. The dreamer drinking from the rain is important evidence of recovery from diseases. And the abundance of good deeds and peace. But if he drinks from it and the water is not clean, it leads to feeling tired and in a bad mood. The vision expresses the dreamer’s behavior in every sin and his life with great psychological comfort that makes him endlessly happy. Among the unintended consequences of this vision: If the dreamer sees The appearance of major problems due to this rain, it means that some harmful events will come in his life and he must be careful while solving them. If the dreamer sees that the trees have been affected by the intensity of the rain, this means that there will be damages that will affect the entire community, so he must join others so that He finds the appropriate solution to this disaster. If the rain causes any damage, whether to plants or buildings, it leads to a financial loss for the fortuneteller, which makes him hated and distressed, so he must seek help from his Lord to protect him from every worry or distress. What is the interpretation of heavy rain in a dream according to Ibn Sirin? Imam Ibn Sirin believes that this vision varies according to the seasons in which the rain falls. It shows that society is exposed to a common crisis. Seeing it in winter is an expression of the amount of effort the dreamer is making to reach his ambitions, especially if the dream is not accompanied by lightning or thunder. When you see spring and rain, this depends on the dreamer’s appearance. As for seeing fall and rain during that This means that the dreamer is behaving badly and needs to correct it immediately so as not to find dire consequences. There is no doubt that rain is good and a provision from the Lord of the worlds, so we find that seeing it benefits everyone, not just the dreamer. We find that the unexpected meanings are summarized in the event that rain causes problems or If the water is turbid, then the dreamer must look at his condition and approach his Lord, who changes events from one state to another. Through Google, you can join us on the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website and visions, and you will find everything that you do in it. Heavy rain in a dream for a single woman, if the rain is in Reality expresses goodness. We find this in a woman’s dream, evidence of the approaching happy occasions and events. Bathing under water is evidence of her close marriage to a man who is distinguished in his qualities and morals and of not neglecting his prayers. If the rain falls in the form of pearls and not water, this indicates prosperity and contentment.

title: Interpretation of seeing my ex-wife’s wife in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing my ex-wife in a dream? There is a lot of research on the interpretation of seeing my ex-husband in a dream, and it is common for a woman to see her ex-husband in a dream after her divorce, as dreams are a reflection of the dreamer’s psychological state and feelings. . Therefore, in this article, a different website offers you the interpretation of seeing my ex-wife’s wife in a dream. The interpretation of seeing my ex-wife in a dream. Commentators said that it is possible that the interpretation of seeing my ex-wife in a dream is evidence that she was the reason for the divorce between the spouses. Also, the woman’s vision of her wife An ex-wife in a dream indicates a great injustice committed by her husband in her life, so she divorced him. It is possible that the psychological state of the woman after her divorce is bad, as this vision is a projection of the psychological state and a release from what is in her mind. The interpretation of seeing my ex-wife in a dream can be a good omen that indicates that The woman will return to her husband again. This vision is often due to the poor psychological state of the divorced woman and her feeling of injustice and betrayal by her husband. All of this is a manifestation of what is happening inside her, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Click on the image to go to the store and complete the purchase. Interpretation of the vision of my ex-wife’s family In a dream: According to Ibn Sirin, if a woman sees her ex-husband’s family in a dream, this is evidence that her situation will change for the better. Seeing your ex-husband’s family in a dream is considered a good vision and may mean that you will get a lot of sustenance. If she sees that her ex-husband and his family are in her house, This indicates that his ex-wife feels remorse and his desire to return to her again. Interpretation of seeing my ex-wife in a dream while she is pregnant: It is possible to see the pregnancy of a divorced woman in a dream, as the divorced woman thinks a lot about her ex-husband and regrets divorcing him. Also, this vision could be a sign of A divorced woman feels very lonely. It is said that the interpretation of seeing my ex-wife in a dream is that the woman is going through a period full of heartbreak and turmoil. Interpretation of a dream about divorce through marriage: Seeing a divorced woman marrying her ex-husband in a dream means that she is going through a period full of sadness and anxiety. This vision is likely to be liberation. Which is happening in her subconscious mind and is an indication of her thinking about her ex-husband and her desire to return to him. The divorced woman who sees this vision must take things easily and look for something to occupy herself with. Interpretation of a dream that my ex-husband wants to take me back in a dream. Seeing a divorced woman in a dream is... Trying to bring back his ex-wife brings good news to the divorced woman and indicates that disagreements between her and her ex-husband are coming. This vision may also indicate that the divorced woman will return to her husband, God willing. Interpretation of seeing a divorced woman crying in a dream. It is said: If a divorced woman sees her ex-husband crying in her dream, this indicates The presence of a gland has connotations that vary depending on the husband’s condition. If her ex-husband cries, but loudly, this is not good, as this may indicate that sadness and anxiety will affect her ex-husband. But if a divorced woman sees her ex-husband crying in her dream, but without

title: Interpretation of seeing a white car in a dream and its interpretations

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a white car in a dream: There is no doubt that traveling and transporting a person from one place to another in the old days was very difficult, and the methods of using it were different, there is by land and sea, in addition to this, the atmosphere made people’s lives easier and saved time and effort, in addition to Speed, comfort, and a sense of security. Interpretation of seeing a white car in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a white car in a dream for a man. The discovery of cars began with the industrial revolution, and at the same time, steam-powered and internal-combustion cars were used and then developed with the advent of oil and the use of gasoline as fuel, and the development of technology And manufacturing cars with the latest types. Seeing a white car indicates that a man is looking for a source of income and a job through which he can earn a living. Seeing a man driving an old white car indicates that the money in his possession is forbidden. It also indicates that there is a good aura for him on the arrival Abundant goodness and happiness, relief from his worries, and freedom from troubles. Then the dreamer’s dream of driving a white car portends his promotion at work and reaching a strong and wonderful position. Moreover, a white car for an unmarried man is a good omen in his connection with a girl with good morals and religion. See also : Interpretation of seeing a passport in a dream and its interpretations Seeing a white car in a dream for married couples Cars are considered one of the most important means of transportation for many people today because they provide comfort to the individual in addition to saving time and effort, and there are different types of cars such as small private cars or large buses that transport passengers and the rest. Buying a car White by a married woman indicates the abundance of wealth and vast power that awaits her in her life. This dream also indicates that her situation will change for the better and that there will be positive changes in her coming days. Seeing a married woman in a car in a dream indicates that she belongs to a family and great lineage. Which it belongs to. On the other hand, driving a car and having people with it means that it conflicts with their lives. In addition, this vision foretells the emergence of pregnancy and nourishment with righteous offspring and righteous caliphs. See also: Interpretation of a gold necklace in a dream for a married woman and its interpretations Interpretation of seeing a white car In a dream for single people, many scientists are searching for an alternative to using gasoline as fuel for cars and reducing the environmental problems it causes, such as harmful gases that cause global warming and others. One of these means is the use of biodiesel and natural gas. Seeing a white car for unmarried women is a good sign of marriage and his connection to a man of morals and religion. This vision suggests a lot of goodness and satisfaction, in addition to achieving success and achieving what she wants. Moreover, her dream of owning the white car portends her salvation from all the obstacles and difficulties she faces. In addition, when an unmarried woman washes the car, it is fortunate that she She will return from the wrong path and repent. And the woman is not a woman

title: Interpretation of seeing ants in a dream on the body in different cases and interpretations

preview.html: Interpretation of ants in a dream on the body in different situations and interpretations. Ants are a small insect that everyone is accustomed to seeing everywhere, especially in the hot seasons. They go out in search of food to store for the winter and disappear completely during the winter. In general, ants are not considered a harmful insect, but there are some types of ants that can sting. People and their harm. In this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of ants in a dream on the body in different cases and interpretations. Interpretation of the dream of seeing ants on the body in a dream. Dream interpretation scholars say that if the sleeper sees in his dream that ants are gathering on his body and walking on it, then this vision indicates that the dreamer He insults others and commits the sin of backbiting and gossiping. Seeing ants walking in the mouth in a dream means delving into people’s honor. If the sleeper sees in his dream that ants cover his entire body and walk on it, this indicates the presence of someone who is jealous of the dreamer and has hatred for him. If the sleeper sees in his dream that Ants walking on the body of a dead person they know, this is evidence that this dead person committed many sins in his life and that he took the orphans’ money unjustly. Seeing ants walking in your hair in a dream is an undesirable vision that carries bad connotations and indicates the occurrence of many problems and unfortunate events during this period. Next. Also, seeing ants walking in the hair in a dream means that the dreamer is committing sins, and this vision may indicate the dreamer’s inability to achieve his goals. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that ants walking on her body, this is a good vision that promises her to hear happy news. In the very near future. And if the sleeper sees in his dream that ants are walking on his body, picking it up, and eating it, then this is an abominable vision that indicates the death of a person near the dreamer, and only God knows the time. Interpretation of a dream about seeing ants walking on my feet in a dream. If the sleeper sees in his dream that ants are walking On his feet, this is a sign of many difficulties that hinder the dreamer's ability to achieve his goals and realize his long-awaited ambitions. Dream interpretation scholars say that seeing ants walking on a person in a dream indicates that the dreamer will try to travel, but will not be able to do so. And if The dreamer sees that a large number of ants are walking on his feet in the dream, then this is a sign that he will lose the work he is working on. Interpretation of the dream of seeing ants walking on his hands in a dream. The great scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin says in his book: If the sleeper sees in his dream large numbers of ants walking On his hands, this is evidence of the dreamer wasting money. Seeing ants walking on one’s hand in a dream is an undesirable dream, which indicates the loss that the dreamer will suffer in the coming period, as well as material crises and poverty. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that ants walking on Her hand, this is a sign that her engagement has been broken and the person she is engaged to does not deserve her. Seeing a large number of ants walking on his hands in a dream indicates the difficulties that the dreamer faces in achieving his dreams and goals. Interpretation of dreams when I see ants sting me in a dreamIf the sleeper sees in his dream that ants

title: Interpretation of a dream about a snake for a single woman by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a snake according to Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen The dream is a group of fantasies that afflict people periodically and differ in order, logic, and general theory, especially in the process of interpretation and recognition of the dream in general. So the dream was divided into a group of classifications and types, including the vision, which is something positive and beloved by God Almighty. , and brings with it good news and a great sign of goodness, while the dream can be negative and wonderful. Something bad from Satan, God forbid. Interpretation of a dream about a snake for a single woman by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen. Interpretation of dreams about a snake chasing me for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about a snake in the life of a single woman refers to some indicators and behaviors that she goes through in her daily life, so a large number of girls search for an interpretation of the dream and find out what the meaning of it leads to. This dream, and in order to interpret a dream about a snake chasing me in a dream for a single woman, is: The snake in the life of an unmarried girl symbolizes the presence of a spoiled young man in her life, so she must stay away from him. A snake chasing an unmarried girl is an indication of the presence of a bad friend in her life at this time. Therefore, she must be very careful about these behaviors that she is exposed to. Seeing a snake in a dream chasing an unmarried girl is a sign of that girl’s bad deeds and she must return to Almighty God in life. A snake in the life of an unmarried girl can indicate the presence of a jealous personality. She is spiteful and always follows the news that passes through life constantly. Ibn Sirin explained that one girl being chased by snakes could be a sign of multiple crises and problems that she faces in life, and therefore she must be careful. We have presented to you: Interpretation of the dream of seeing someone you love in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a black snake for a single woman: A human dream can pass through many different fantasies and scenes, so it is necessary to reach its accurate interpretation and this helps to know the scientific and cognitive importance that the dream always leads us to. Black snake: Seeing a black snake in a dream is evidence of a group of bad feelings and thoughts that the girl experiences during the day and she must control them and stay away from them during this time. The black snake may mean some dangers surrounding the girl, and they may be related to the family environment or social relationships in which she lives. Always. When an unmarried girl sees black snakes in a dream, she must be careful in dealing with emotions and not sympathize with feelings too much and do not get carried away by emotions, so the mind must be controlled and the choice is good. Seeing a snake in a dream killing an unmarried womanKilling a snake is one of the matters It is difficult for a single girl and she cannot bear it, but if she sees this dream in a dream and tries to kill the snake while it is trying to bite her while she is hitting it, then this is evidence of that. Get rid of the problems she is going through in her life and a new feeling of joy and happiness, according to what the people of Ibn Sirin explained. However, if an unmarried girl sees that she sees a snake and becomes a friend to him, but she is not. The dream is afraid of him

title: Interpretation of a dream about escaping from fire in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about lighting a fire in a dream: If the visionary sees a burning fire, people gather around it and use it for warmth. This is evidence of nourishment and goodness for the person. As for seeing a fire burning during the day with smoke and tongues of flame in it, this indicates the calamity and strife that occurs among people. And if he sees a burning fire during the day and there is no smoke in it except tongues. Flame: This is evidence of the spread of diseases among people. If there is a burning fire on the door of a resident’s house and there is no smoke in it, then this indicates God’s help until the dreamer makes a pilgrimage to the House of God. If the fire catches in the house and the owners of the house benefit from it and it does not harm them, then this is evidence that someone is pregnant. The women of this house. Interpretation of seeing a fire in the house. If the dreamer sees a fire in his house, this is a sign of a great misfortune and disaster for the owners of the house and they must face it in reality. And if he sees a fire in his house, this is a warning to the dreamer to abandon the things he is doing that affect him negatively. If he sees a fire in A house other than his own, this is a sign that he will lose one of his family members from the owners of that house. A dream about escaping from fire in a dream is for a man. If the dreamer sees fire and he is a man, this indicates the problems he faces in his life, the many difficulties, his constant anxiety and his constant fear of the future. As for If he can escape from this fire, this is clear evidence that he is facing his problem and the difficulties he faces and will overcome them. And if the dreamer succeeds in escaping from the fire and is extremely afraid of it, then this is indisputable evidence that he will break off his relationship with his life partner because of problems. But if he sees that he is burning the house, this indicates For his intense love for science and its significance for his culture, he tries to benefit others and those around him. Interpretation of a dream about a fire in a relative’s house for a single woman. If a woman sees a fire in her relatives’ house and she is an unmarried girl, this means that the owners of the house are involved in a big problem and you must help them get out of this problem. If she sees that one of her relatives is burning in a fire, this is evidence of his illness or death. But if he dies, he must pray a lot. If the fire is burning in her house, this indicates a person who wants to spoil her relationship with her relatives if she has a strong relationship with them. But if she sees a fire burning in The house of one of her relatives. This indicates that she will be exposed to trouble in the coming days, and it will be a cause of her disappointment and damage to her reputation and distortion. Interpretation of a dream of escaping from a fire in a dream for a married woman. If a woman sees a fire in her dream and gets married, this indicates the state of her pregnancy if she is pregnant. If the fire is glowing and dangerous, this It indicates marital problems between her and her husband. But if she sees a fire coming out of the door of her house and there is no smoke inside it, this is evidence that she will visit the House of God soon. If the fire was in her sleep and she was very afraid of it and she tried to escape from it and was able to escape from it. This indicates that she was She will divorce her husband because of problems. Interpretation of seeing escaping from fire in a dream for a divorced woman. If a woman sees fire in her sleep, she is divorced and the fire devours her face and burns it. This is clear evidence and a portent for him.

title: What is the interpretation of the dream of engagement by Ibn Sirin and senior commentators?

preview.html: Dream engagement: Engagement is the engagement of a man and a woman for a certain period in order to get to know them and decide whether they will get married or not. Seeing an engagement in a dream is one of the dreams that makes many people wonder about the different meanings and connotations related to it, to know whether it brings them good or evil. If it differs between the dreamer, a man or a woman, then we will explain that in some detail in the following lines of the article. Dream of Engagement: There are many scholarly interpretations of seeing an engagement in a dream, the most important of which are: Seeing preaching in a dream symbolizes good deeds, good deeds, and staying away from sin and disobedience. Which makes God Almighty angry. And if you are facing some problems and obstacles in your life and you see your engagement during your sleep, this is a sign of the end of the difficult period that you are going through and your ability to find solutions to the crises that you are going through. If you dream of an engagement but there is no agreement between you and the person with whom you are engaged A relationship, as this symbolizes the unfortunate events that you will go through and your inability to adapt to them. If a person is exposed to a bad psychological state during this period of his life and sees in a dream that he is celebrating his engagement, this proves that the worries and sorrows in his chest will end and happiness, contentment and psychological comfort will come. A dream Engagement by Ibn Sirin Learn with us about the different connotations that jurists mention when seeing an engagement in a dream: Watching an engagement in a dream means that the dreamer is a religious person close to his Lord, who always seeks to stay away from temptations and doubts, and if he goes through difficulties, he will be able to overcome them by the grace of God Almighty, like this. If you dream that you are engaged to your mother or sister, this is a sign that one of them will suffer from heartache and distress in her life and will expose her to a state of extreme sadness that will last with her for a long time. If you dream of rejecting the engagement, this is a sign of your feelings of hesitation and anxiety that prevent you from thinking seriously about the issue of engagement. And marriage. The dream of engagement for a single woman. Below are the most prominent interpretations cited by scholars regarding the vision of engagement in an unmarried woman’s dream: If an unmarried girl dreams of an engagement, this is a sign of the happy news that she will hear soon or her presence in circumstances that bring joy to her heart. And in the event that the girl wants Getting engaged in reality and she sees in a dream that she is celebrating her engagement, this means that God - Glory be to Him - will soon fulfill her desire. If the girl is a science student and watches her engagement while she is sleeping, this is a sign of her excellence in her studies and obtaining the highest grades. When a girl dreams of getting engaged while in reality she is striving to achieve To a specific goal, this proves that she will be able to achieve all her desires and goals in life. Interpretation of the dream of getting engaged to someone by someone she knows When a girl dreams of her engagement with someone she knows and loves in reality, this leads to her connection with this person in the coming days and her wonderful feeling of happiness And relief is the result of realizing her long-awaited dream. For.If an unmarried woman sees in a dream that she was proposed to by a familiar person, this is a sign

For.If an unmarried woman sees in a dream that she was proposed to by a familiar person, this is a sign

title: Learn about the interpretation of seeing a gecko in a dream from Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a gecko in a dream: Seeing a gecko, gecko, or gecko is one of the visions that causes anxiety and distress to its owner. This vision has many connotations that vary based on many considerations, including that the gecko may be white or black, it may be large or small, and it may be dead or entering your home. What concerns us in this article is to mention all the special cases and indications of seeing a gecko in a dream. Learn about the interpretation of seeing a gecko in a dream from Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq. Seeing a gecko in a dream represents lying, deception, taking the wrong path, violating the truth, and spreading corruption. This vision also indicates On the evil instinct and intention, and following wrong ways of walking, misleading people and confusing their minds. Seeing him can indicate sins, gossip, repeated conflicts, creating problems and creating crises. If he sees a gecko watching him from afar, this indicates someone following him and trying to corrupt his mind and opinion and harm him. If he The leprosy is large in size, so this indicates the presence of a very strong and stubborn enemy who does not know the truth. I see: Ibn ShaheenThe gecko, regardless of its shape, size, or color, is of no benefit, and seeing it is a distasteful thing and a bad sign. A gecko in a dream by Imam al-Sadiq. Imam Jaafar al-Sadiq believes that seeing a gecko is A sign of skirmishes, constant movements, the difficulty of life, and numerous conflicts between people. Its vision also indicates the prohibition of truth, the imposition of evil, the practice of forbidden things, the tendency towards falsehood, avoiding the people of the truth, and turning to the world and immersing itself in it. And if someone sees a gecko, this indicates the isolation of people, Alone, and filling them with bad thoughts that harm the owner and disrupt his life. The vision can also indicate a person who does not find the appropriate appreciation from others, the many complications he faces in his life, the instability of the situation in a certain situation and the increasing fluctuations of life. The gecko expresses the enemy, and this enemy declares His hostility is public, and he does this by uttering corrupt words to show himself, and his hand is to draw attention to himself, and he may publicly commit disobedience and guilt. And if you see a gecko eating your flesh, it symbolizes someone who harms you, harms you in gatherings, and wants evil from you, and he will not calm down until he finds you lost in Despair and heartache. A gecko in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin goes on to say that seeing a gecko indicates a false hypocrite who tends to cheat to get what he wants and tries to get what he wants by mistake. His vision also reflects a weak and cunning enemy and a lot of cunning and deception who uses gossip as a means of destroying His rivals and rivals and spreading rumors and lies to spoil reputation. If one sees a gecko in the streets, it indicates a person who spoils the opinion of the general public, spreads suspicion in their hearts, spreads misguidance and heresies, pollutes hearts, and leads people astray from the truth. This vision also indicates distress, and many Of problems and conflicts, feeling sad due to a series of worries and sorrows, and falling into a carefully orchestrated conspiracy. If the fortuneteller sees that a gecko is biting him, this symbolizes the intensification of the situation.
